titles.title: A bill to renew and make technical corrections to the temporary suspension of duty on paclobutrazol technical.
A bill to renew and make technical corrections to the temporary suspension of duty on paclobutrazol technical.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) revise the article description of paclobutrazol technical; and (2) extend the temporary suspension of duty on such article.
